name: Derelict Fleet
description: Derelict Fleet is a fast-paced, space combat game. You are tasked with defending a refugee fleet as you travel the stars searching for a new colony to call home.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD A4 Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 1800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 / Radeon R7 360 Storage: 1800 MB available space
